extendedInfo.description: Digital weather and system info clock widget with size 4x1It features:12/24 hr + Color options on all info displayedSystem Stats InfoHigh resolution weather iconsOption for minutes color to be the same as hoursOption for alternative forecast layoutWeather & Forecast (International)Two weather forecast layoutsInteraction:+tap center->preferences+tap weather icon->forecast+tap Hours->launch anything!+tap Minutes->launch anything!Widgets on Android work a bit differently than a normal application. Unlike regular programs they don't just install themselves in the application tray so you have to add them manually. They will not open or launch.Here's how to add a widget on your Android home screen.STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET==========================1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or âemptyâ area with size 4x1 and hold down your finger.2.An âAdd to Home screenâ window will pop up. From that window, tap âWidgetsâ.3.Youâll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device.4.Select the clock to add to your home screen by tapping it.Notes====="Time frozen/not updating"-> taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers)When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too.ROM users-> make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card.Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage.Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign.For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes.Email problems/suggestionsCheck our website for more help.EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!!Be polite, this is a free app :-)VIDEO HOW TO ADD WIDGETShttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpMLF9b2aTQ

reviews.comment: Awesome app ... I really like it. But please change the sun icon ... The sun looks so dull ... Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Working well on my Droid3!
reviews.comment: Love having my time, date & weather in a nice looking small package. Good customizations. No problems with time. Thanks a bunch!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well, but....
reviews.comment: For some reason on my phone (Fascinate/Mesmerize with Gingerbread OS) the time does not update. Everything else works great so I\'m giving it two stars and hoping they\'ll fix it. If/when that is fixed, I\'ll bump it to 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works exactly as described
reviews.comment: I wanted a small clock/weather widget for my Droid Razr and this works well.  Took a few minutes to figure out the color scheme and how to set but works exactly as described with a small footprint.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Accurate and Practical
reviews.comment: This widget looks good, accurately forecasts weather, and is quite practical with options and customization. Works for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Darn...
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t appear visually on the home screen. Not sure what\'s going on. Can still move and delete. It will still move other icons out of the way, its just invisible. Wish it worked for me, seems like a good widget from the reviews. Will reinstall if fixed and change rating. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: Great customability, great look, but when ever i shut my phone off th back on the clock doesn\'t work(streched and cut off)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great quick launch option
reviews.comment: It saves room on my home screen. I wish the 4x1 sizes had the option to add battery life under the date like the 4x2 size.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs to be fixed/updated
reviews.comment: Lags like crazy, have to manually update the time almost every time I check my phone, using an atrix running gingerbread excluded from task killer too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stoped working
reviews.comment: Worked fine before gingerbread update, now have to tap time to refresh it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it, but....
reviews.comment: Loved it on my Desire.... but.... The clock refreshes only when I tap on the widget on my Motorola Milestone X.  I don\'t know if it\'s a Gingerbread issue, or Milestone issue.  Works fine otherwise.  Please fix refresh issue!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Makes my home screen a lot less cluttered. It would look better if the time was in the middle and the date on the left.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great free widget. Never had any problems with it what so ever. Samsung Galaxy S. NB- Kris, you can set the widget to open apps (ie alarm) in settings
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Give 5 \342\230\205 if you can make it aLL cLear, its great but do not Like the white on it ... EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it!I can open something quickly by tapping the time and I get an instant weather forecast just with a tap,And i love how you can personalise it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clock
reviews.comment: This clock is great ....small setup and tons of information about your phone... most apps you have to pay money for that I give it a 5/5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FC very often :-(
reviews.comment: Very good widget, for 4x1 size, best info and layout but it started to FC too often
reviews.author: Martin Raketak

reviews.title: One of the better clock / weather widget
reviews.comment: One of the better clock / weather widget, but sometime forced closed or doesn\'t work - Samsung S2; some options for different skins would be a nice addition
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but DOES freeze. I do not have any task kill
reviews.comment: Great but DOES freeze. I do not have any task killer running so the developer is incorrect regarding that being the issue.  If it did not freeze I would give 5 easily but this issue needs to be resolved.  Also I could not find a way to email the developer.  I would be MORE than willing to be a guinea pig with a version that logs everything to find this problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Also broken
reviews.comment: Exhibits same issue with weather that other apps by this team have - why is the weather picker suddenly broken on everything you guys make?  Fire whoever broke the weather and caused everyone to hate your (used-to-be) awesome widgets.
reviews.author: Tim Mallett
